title: Pee Wee’s Big Adventure
description: The name’s Herman. P.W. Herman. He and Dottie must retrieve his stolen motorbike–the X-1–before the Soviets discover the secret compartment and important microfilm.
quote: I know you are… but what am I?
altHero: Pee Wee (Brolin) and Dottie (Fairchild) embrace by a tree
alt1: Pee Wee approaches Dottie from a slick red motorbike
alt3: Pee Wee prepares for a fight with some assassins
alt4: Pee Wee and Dottie look at each other and between them the real Pee Wee Herman cameos as a bellhop
